entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is packing his trunk and moving his prefect's badge around.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who noticed Ron moving his prefect's badge around.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who dropped in with George to offer help.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who dropped in with Fred to offer help.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the one who returned from Diagon Alley with books and a package.

relationships.description: Ron has his prefect's badge, which he keeps moving around.
Fred and George helped Ron by offering to attach the prefect's badge to his forehead with a Permanent Sticking Charm.
Mrs. Weasley visited Diagon Alley and returned with books and a package.
